an4.45:1.1: Once, the Blessed One was dwelling at Sāvatthi in Jeta Forest, Anāthapiṇdika's Monastery.
an4.45:1.2: Then, as the night progressed, Rohitassa, a strikingly handsome young angel, having illuminated the entire Jeta Forest, approached the Blessed One, bowed down to him, and stood to one side. While standing to one side, Rohitassa the young angel said this to the Blessed One:
an4.45:2.1: “Venerable, is it possible to know, to see, or to arrive at the end of the world—where one is not born, and does not age, die, pass away, or be reborn—through walking there?”
